Description.Text:
Property Location
Ona Club Novelty is centrally located in Salou, walking distance from Levante Beach and close to Ponent Beach. This apartment is within close proximity of Capellans Beach and PortAventura.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 30 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with double sofa beds. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 30 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with double sofa beds. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Ona Club Novelty is centrally located in Salou, walking distance from Levante Beach and close to Ponent Beach. This apartment is within close proximity of Capellans Beach and PortAventura.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Levante Beach - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Ponent Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Capellans Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
PortAventura - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Cala Font Beach - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Port Aventura Golf Course - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Aquopolis Costa Dorada - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Cambrils Beach - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Carrefour Commercial Center - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Paleo-Christian Necropolis and Museum - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Tarragona Port - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Central Park Shopping Center - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Plaza de Toros - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Tarraco Roman Theater - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Plaza Imperial Tarraco - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Reus (REU) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 82.6 km / 51.3 mi

The preferred airport for Ona Club Novelty is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
